response.original_title: Born to Ride. À quatre ans et demi, j'ai perdu ma jambe
response.overview: Sébastien Bichon loses his leg at 4 and a half years old. In this documentary, we follow him through a crazy 1200 kilometer bicycle race. A challenge never before undertaken by a person with a disability.
response.title: Born to Ride. À quatre ans et demi, j'ai perdu ma jambe
